attributes.action: give some financial help to the disabled people who receive the Upper mobility rate and the Middle and Upper Care rates of DLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gas and electricity prices are rocketing and the disabled are hit the worst. Most of them are unable to work so are at home all day trying to keep warm but many have to choose between eating and akeeping warm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
